alert.note: Alert for Cleburne; Southeast Van Buren County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 31 at 3:41AM CST until January 31 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST TUESDAY... ...ICE STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...An additional round of freezing rain and sleet are expected this afternoon through Wednesday morning. Ice accruals should be less than a quarter inch. Sleet accumulations should be less than a tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of northern Arkansas. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Be sure to check road conditions before traveling in these areas. Visit the Arkansas Department of Transportation`s website Idrivearkansas.com for the latest road and traffic conditions. Travel is strongly discouraged. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages.
